WorkItem.Description: See my character xml file attached
WorkItem.Summary: [Enhance] DPS increase with FT/FT over WF/FT

Comments.Message: I also noticed a slight dps increase with ft/ft over wf/ft on Rawr, but it's also telling me to gem spirit gems so I'm not sure I believe this program.

It's been saying that about my character for a while now. I've just been ignoring it and keeping it on Windfury. When you do set it to FT/FT, it starts recommending caster weapons too. Haven't had time to test FT/FT.

Also seeing a very minor increase in Rawr, approx 70dps.  But like ZDBioHazard, I have tended to ignore this.

@lordmagnet: it suggesting you equip spirit gems is a different issue.
I shall investigate. It looks like it might be double dipping on FT imbue.
Suggesting equiping Spirit gems sounds like a severe mana issue - can you post that as a new issue please with examples of what you mean.

Fixed. It was calculating the number of Windfury hits even if you didn't have windfury on the main hand. Therefore the number of swings was a LOT higher than it should have been for flametongue. ie: all the double hits wf gives were being treated as extra FT hits.

I've added a condition that says only add WF hits if WF on main hand.
